name: Tower Troubles
description:
Hi all!

This my first time ever publishing a game and would love some feedback. The game turned out a lot nicer than I ever thought I could make and it's legitimately fun! 

  • 10 different turret types including damage boosters and range boosters which adds a nice strategic element to the game. 
  • 10 enemy types including healers, stunners, fliers, and zombies.
  • 3 Worlds 10 levels each.
